content: Yes, it is widely accepted that geopolitical events and external factors continue to have significant impacts on world events today. For example, the rise of China as a global superpower and the growing influence of Russia in international affairs are current geopolitical issues that are shaping world politics today. Additionally, technological advancements and climate change are having significant impacts on world events as well. The study of international relations and the analysis of the interactions between states and non-state actors remain relevant as an important method of understanding contemporary world events.
